itemLabel: Thomas Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Henry Raymond Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde JP DL (2 October 1901 – 21 March 1983). The son of Thomas Gair Ashton, 1st Baron Ashton of Hyde and Eva Margaret James. He succeeded his father as 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde on the latter's death on 1 May 1933. On his death in 1983 he was succeeded in the barony by his son.

link_mentions.page: Thomas Ashton, 3rd Baron Ashton of Hyde
response: Thomas John Ashton, 3rd Baron Ashton of Hyde,  (19 November 1926 – 2 August 2008) was the eldest son of Thomas Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde and Marjorie Nell Brookes. He succeeded his father as Baron Ashton of Hyde on the latter's death on 21 March 1983.

link_mentions.page: Thomas Henry Raymond Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde
response: #REDIRECT Thomas Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde
*Thomas Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde (1901–1983), eldest surviving son of Thomas Ashton, 1ste Baron Ashton
#Marjorie Nell Brooks b. 11 Dec 1901, d. 1993, married Thomas Ashton, 2nd Baron Ashton of Hyde.
